legacy.full_text: President #XiJinping stressed the role of people in #China-#US relations at a welcome dinner on Wednesday by friendly organizations in San Francisco. https://t.co/ksb1eQ5yjI

legacy.description: Our mission is to provide news and perspectives on China to a global audience. Download the People's Daily app for news on China.
legacy.name: People's Daily app

legacy.full_text: At the welcome dinner in San Francisco, Xi said that China is ready to invite 50,000 young Americans to China on exchange and study programs in the next five years to increase exchanges between the two peoples, especially between the youth.

legacy.description: Our mission is to provide news and perspectives on China to a global audience. Download the People's Daily app for news on China.
legacy.name: People's Daily app

legacy.full_text: Furthermore, Xi said that China will not fight a cold war or a hot war with anyone, and whatever stage of development it may reach, China will never pursue hegemony or expansion and will never impose its will on others.

legacy.description: Our mission is to provide news and perspectives on China to a global audience. Download the People's Daily app for news on China.
legacy.name: People's Daily app

legacy.full_text: President #XiJinping met his US counterpart #JoeBiden at the Filoli estate in #SanFrancisco on Wednesday. The two leaders talked behind closed doors for about 2 hours. People's Daily reporter Li Bowen is currently in San Francisco to cover the events. https://t.co/m7XoK3fete

legacy.full_text: Chinese President #XiJinping and US President #JoeBiden on Wednesday had a candid and in-depth exchange of views on strategic and overarching issues critical to the direction of #China-#US relations and on major issues affecting world peace and development. https://t.co/CawRH1XVDa

legacy.description: Our mission is to provide news and perspectives on China to a global audience. Download the People's Daily app for news on China.
legacy.name: People's Daily app

legacy.full_text: During the summit meeting, President Xi Jinping emphasized the importance of the US side taking tangible actions to uphold its commitment to not supporting "Taiwan independence," discontinuing the arming of Taiwan and supporting China's peaceful reunification.

legacy.description: Our mission is to provide news and perspectives on China to a global audience. Download the People's Daily app for news on China.
legacy.name: People's Daily app

legacy.full_text: Furthermore, during the meeting, President Xi and President Joe Biden agreed to resume high-level military-to-military communication based on equality and mutual respect.

legacy.description: Our mission is to provide news and perspectives on China to a global audience. Download the People's Daily app for news on China.

legacy.full_text: The front page of Thursday’s People’s Daily reports that Chinese President #XiJinping on Tuesday arrived in #SanFrancisco for a summit with US President #JoeBiden and to attend the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) Economic Leaders' Meeting. https://t.co/ymKUcxeA6k

legacy.full_text: The front page also reports that an article on handling important relationships in enhancing ecological conservation by President Xi Jinping will be published in this year's 22nd issue of the Qiushi Journal on Thursday.

legacy.full_text: Another story reports that the congratulatory letter sent to the 2023 annual conference of the summit for entrepreneurs across the Taiwan Strait by President Xi on Tuesday has greatly encouraged the cross-Strait entrepreneurs.
